attributes.action: We the British People want a Leave Politician to lead the BREXIT/EU negotiations
attributes.additional_details: The UK government have involved themselves in war and preached and implemented democracy for other countries.  Now it is time for our Government to lead by example, practise what they have been preaching and have invaded other countries for - DEMOCRACY. "THE PEOPLE HAVE SPOKEN."  We now require a leader who is a Leave politician to negotiate the Brexit terms.  It would be reprehensible to expect a Remain politician to negotiate clean Brexit terms.  Leavers want out.
attributes.background: The media is naming and featuring Remain politicians as potential leaders to negotiate Brexit with EU, whilst discrediting Leave politicians. A Remain politician will not represent the best interest of what the British people have voted for and will only have their interest foremost.
